regen.absent_element: alert continuation until emergency call termination
regen.new_specification: A continuous visual and audible indication that the emergency call remains active shall persist in the cab until the call is terminated.

regen.absent_element: termination of visual and audible alerts
regen.new_specification: The system shall terminate the visual and audible alerts in the cab when the Railway emergency call is terminated.

regen.absent_element: situation for terminating visual and audible alerts post call termination or failure
regen.new_specification: A continuous visual and audible indication that the emergency function is active shall cease once the call is terminated or upon detecting a failure.

label: Once the call is terminated, the continuous visual alarm indication in the cab shall cease.
